name: Independence Contract Drilling, Inc.
description: Independence Contract Drilling, Inc. is a leading provider of contract drilling services to the oil and natural gas exploration and production industry. Established in 2011 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, ICDI specializes in the operation of modern, high-specification drilling rigs. The company focuses on efficiency and technological advancement within the drilling sector, aiming to reduce costs and improve performance for its clients. With a fleet of advanced drilling rigs, ICDI is well-positioned to serve both onshore and offshore markets. Their services cater primarily to independent oil and gas operators, providing them with the necessary resources to enhance their drilling operations. Independence Contract Drilling emphasizes safety, reliability, and environmental responsibility, ensuring its operations meet the highest standards. The company is committed to enhancing its service offerings through continuous innovation and investment in technology. As the energy sector evolves, ICDI aims to adapt to changing market demands while maintaining its core values of integrity and excellence.

seo.meta_title: Independence Contract Drilling, Inc. | Leading Contract Drilling Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Independence Contract Drilling, Inc., a key player in the drilling industry providing efficient and modern contract drilling services for the oil and gas sector.

faq.question: What services does Independence Contract Drilling provide?
faq.answer: Independence Contract Drilling provides contract drilling services primarily for the oil and natural gas industry.

faq.question: Where is Independence Contract Drilling headquartered?
faq.answer: Independence Contract Drilling is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: When was Independence Contract Drilling founded?
faq.answer: Independence Contract Drilling was founded in 2011.
